SEARCH
Package com.example.namesplitter.api

Klasse RESTService

java.lang.Object
com.example.namesplitter.api.RESTService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
APIService
@RestController public class RESTService extends Object implements APIService
This class provides a RESTful API service for name parsing and title management. It implements the APIService interface.

  • Methodendetails

    • parse

      public APIResponse parse(String name)
      This method parses a given name into its components. It creates a new Parser, parses the name, and returns an APIResponse. The APIResponse contains a list of errors (if any) and the parsed name.
      Angegeben von:
      parse in Schnittstelle APIService
      Parameter:
      name - The name to parse.
      Gibt zurück:
      An APIResponse containing the parsed name and any errors.

    • getTitles

      public List<TitleData> getTitles()
      This method retrieves all academic titles from the title storage.
      Angegeben von:
      getTitles in Schnittstelle APIService
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of all academic titles.

    • addTitle

      public boolean addTitle(TitleData title)
      This method adds a new title to the title storage.
      Angegeben von:
      addTitle in Schnittstelle APIService
      Parameter:
      title - The title to add.
      Gibt zurück:
      A boolean indicating whether the title was successfully added.

    • removeTitle

      public boolean removeTitle(TitleData title)
      This method removes a title from the title storage.
      Angegeben von:

    • save

      public StructuredName save(StructuredName name)

      Angegeben von:

      Gibt zurück:
